import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters'; import '/Users/adityaarora/reactportfolio/src/components/Contact/index.scss' import {useEffect, useState} from 'react' const Contact= ()=> { const [letterClass,setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const t="I am currently looking for a oppurtunity to work as intern in a Tech startup or a company where I can learn and grow as a developer." const p1=t.split(" ") let p2=[] for(let i=0;i{ setTimeout(()=>{ setLetterClass ('text-animate-hover')},3500) }) return (<>


My inbox is always open. Whether you have a whether you have a oppurtunity for me or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

) } export default Contact;
